description:
A 10-speed chain from Shimano’s Deore groupset.

  • Unidirectional (asymmetrical) design uses different inner and outer plate chamfers and dimensions to accommodate the different shifting requirements when moving the chain inward or outward
  • Compatible with Deore 6000 series and Tiagra 4700
  • Mud shedding design helps trail muck from hitching a ride in your drivetrain
name: Shimano CN-HG54 10-Speed Chain
